channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Presidential Fitness Test is coming back
item.description: NPR's Leila Fadel speaks with sports physician Jordan Metzl about President Trump's effort to revive the Presidential Fitness Test.

item.title: What's the deal with electrolyte drinks — do you need them to stay hydrated?
item.description: Seems like nobody's drinking plain water these days. Electrolyte packets or colorful sports drinks are everywhere. But do you need them?
